title: EXTREME League Of Legends Client Lag
body:
Hello! For a month  I have been experiencing EXTREME client lag. Now to the point where I cant accept a game because clicking accept would be unresponsive. Its like my CPU usage and Memory usage are both 100% but I checked and they are fine. I could play COD and not lag while having the league client open (so I know its not my computer). 

For the past month, its been lagging and I was still able to play, but i barely was able to go through the champ select and the client in general. 
I am using Windows 10 64 bit. 

I've completely reinstalled league and yesterday I got to play a few games until later tried playing again and the same lag came back. I am tired of this, please could someone help me?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time staying connected to the servers. This often happens if you have local network settings that conflict with League. I strongly encourage you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are okay.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I don't have any high ping or connection problems tho! 
Also here the client's letters are also all broken 

https://snag.gy/BF5bHh.jpg 

And by lag I don't mean latency :( As in like while in the client, its like im using a computer with 512mb ram, and a single core 1.0 ghz processor with chrome open in the background

It's extremely likely that working through the steps in that connection guide and [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of your client will resolve this issue.

Let me know the results.
